channel.title: Can't Get Scar To Work, Help Please!
channel.description:
So this is my first time trying to use SCAR. I've tried a bunch of woodcutting programs, but can't get any to work. I downloaded both 3.01 and 2.03 versions, along with the latest includes and SRLs to my knowledge. There are 2 programs that I'd like to get help with, cuz if I can figure out the problems with these two then I might be able to get others to work. Here they are:
1. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11863.0.html
I run this and get the error: [Runtime Error] : Out Of Range in line 46 in script C:\DOCUME~1\Keegan\LOCALS~1\Temp\PCutter-6.scar
(its a line where you enter your username and password)
2. http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/powerkut-smartzkid-t9270.html (had to download version 2.03 for this)
I run this, SCAR does not identify any errors, but absolutely NOTHING happens in the game.
Honestly I have no idea what to do, after trying everything I can think of for a few hours. I'm using the default RS client on runescape.com, and run the program when I'm logged in. Is there a special client needed for SCAR scripts? Amd I supposed to run these programs after logging in or what?
I'd appreciate any help. Thanks in advance!
-Chapati

item.title: Can't Get Scar To Work, Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

ur welcome. pm me if you have more quesitons.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Get Scar To Work, Help Please!

item.title: Can't Get Scar To Work, Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Chapati Chapati
item.description:
@Chapati wrote:

Nevermind, the problem with the macro that did nothing was that it was actually updating itself lol. It works very well now. Autochops, autodetects trees according to my level, and auto lights them once the inventory is full. Thanks for those of you who posted.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Get Scar To Work, Help Please!

seems like a srl one, that isn’t a name that someone new would proably name something.

or else it is a form variable. (checkbox2 maybe)

item.title: Can't Get Scar To Work, Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

[quote=“Chapati, post:3, topic:80698”]Thanks Bobby.

I found a few things I needed to correct. I got the new SRL. Now I’m getting this error with number one:

Failed when compiling
Line 177: [Error] (17892:7): Unknown identifier ‘cBox2’ in script

Know anything?[/quote]
is cBox2 declared under the bold Var or Const?

(not sure if this is it, i dont know scar that much.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bobby wrote:

  1. not all scirpts work with all poeple, tough luck sorry, they also never relaly worked fror me. write your own scripts, and they will owrk, since you made them

  2. put all scirpts in the scripts folder and download the new srl from insside scar 3.01, it is in the menu.

@Chapati wrote:

So this is my first time trying to use SCAR. I’ve tried a bunch of woodcutting programs, but can’t get any to work. I downloaded both 3.01 and 2.03 versions, along with the latest includes and SRLs to my knowledge. There are 2 programs that I’d like to get help with, cuz if I can figure out the problems with these two then I might be able to get others to work. Here they are:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I run this and get the error:
[Runtime Error] : Out Of Range in line 46 in script C:\DOCUME~1\Keegan\LOCALS~1\Temp\PCutter-6.scar

Honestly I have no idea what to do, after trying everything I can think of for a few hours. I’m using the default RS client on runescape.com, and run the program when I’m logged in. Is there a special client needed for SCAR scripts? Amd I supposed to run these programs after logging in or what?

I’d appreciate any help. Thanks in advance!
